ovdesc.p: This is a Type "W" file that is used to poupulate the file F.INT.MOVEMENT based on the contents of the Parameter file, INT.MOVEMENT.PARAM. This is essentially to be used as a conversion program to extract the details of Interest and Tax entries generated within the database until the Interest and Tax entries are extracted automatically by the Accounting module. The "Verify" function is used to start the extraction of Interest and Tax entries. Any discrepancies found during the extract process (like Account not found in both live and History file etc) will be logged in the file EXCEPTION.LOG so that they can be corrected manually if required.

desc.p: This field is reserved for future use.
Noinput field reserved for future use.
Noinput.
This field is reserved for future use.
Noinput field reserved for future use.
Noinput.
This field is reserved for future use.
Noinput field reserved for future use.
Noinput.
Flag "Y" or "N" to indicate if the file STMT.ENTRY is to be used in the extraction of data.
If "Y" the file STMT.ENTRY will be selected to extract the Interest and Tax movements.
Only the values "Y" or "N" will be accepted.
This field is reserved for future use.
Noinput field reserved for future use.
Noinput.
Flag "Y" or "N" to specify if Inteerst and Tax movements have to be extracted from Money Market or Loans and Deposits files.

This field is used to extract the Interest movements for MM and LD deals when the Interest is capitalised. If set to "Y" the system will read LMM.SCHEDULES.PAST to get details of Interest and Tax entries.
Only the value "Y" or "N" will be accepted.
Flag "Y" or "N" to indicate if the Interest and Tax entries are to be recreated.
If "Y" the file F.INT.MOVEMENT will be cleared down before populating it. If "N" the system will append data to existing records or create new record in the file.
Only "Y" or "N" will be accepted.
This field is reserved for future use.
Noinput field reserved for future use.
Noinput.
Species the SELECT LIST to be used if the FILE STMT.ENTRY is to be selected.

Since the file STMT.ENTRY can get quite large, this filed will enable the user to supply a SELECT LIST to the extraction routine. If nothing is eneterd in this field and EXTRACT.STMT.ENTRY is set to "Y", the system will select the STMT.ENTRY file and save it and also update this field with the SAVE(d) Select List Id so that it can be used later.
0-35 character Alphanumeric data.
Multi Language description of this record.
Multivalued to enable input os description in different languages.
3 - 35 character, Multi Language field.
